casebody.data:
Clifford LUDVIGH, as Trustee, etc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Jacob DIAMOND, Defendant-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 2 1924.) No. 358. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for thj' Southern District of New York. Archibald Palmer and David B. Tolins, both of New York City, for appellant. Rosenthal & Heermance, of New York City (S. Michael Cohen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
